# Overview 

[Github Repository](https://github.com/abrehman94/Linux-Scripting-Tutorial)

Developed a tutorial that introduces Ubuntu 20.02 to the High school 
students. Starting from the basics of Linux, GUI interface to the 
terminal environment. Then moving on to the bash scripting. 
The tutorial is designed to be interactive and hands-on with an 
exercise to sort songs by author name.
